Our funders

Our vision, our research successes and our people development are only realisable by the strong support from our University and from the following National and International funders:

  • Engineering and Physical Sciences Research Council (EPSRC; UKRI)
  • Leverhulme Trust
  • Royal Academy of Engineering (RAEng)
  • King Fahd University of Petroleum and Minerals (KFUPM)
  • China Scholarship Council (CSC)
  • Commonwealth Scholarship Commission (UK)
  • The Weir Family Foundation
  • ARCHER (UK’s National Supercomputer)
  • European Commission
Website Design and Implementation

This website was created (and is maintained) by Rohit Pillai. It was built using Jekyll, inspired by the elegant designs of D. Allan Drummond and Woo Young Ahn (these were both in turn inspired by Trevor Bedford's site). Rather than branching any of these templates, we started from a basic Bootstrap template, and adopted/adapted bits of other code during customization. The mfX logo was designed by Matthew Borg.

This site’s source code is freely available on GitHub and deployed using GitHub Pages. If you are a mfX group member and want to edit existing information or add new content to the website, please read the contribution guide first.
